org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.util

Class SettingsEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • java.awt.AWTEvent
        • org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.util.SettingsEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SettingsEvent
extends AWTEvent
    Class SettingsEvent represents a change that has occurred to some setting in a CalorimeterPanel object. It stores both the triggering object and an int primitive which corresponds to the particular setting that triggered the event.
    See Also:
    CalorimeterPanel, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PROPERTY_HOVER_HIGHLIGHT
      Indicates that the panel's behavior for highlighting crystals that are under the cursor has changed.
      static int PROPERTY_SCALE_COLOR_MAP
      Indicates that the panel's energy-to-color map has changed.
      static int PROPERTY_SCALE_RANGE
      Indicates that a change has occurred to the panel's scale minimum or maximum value.
      static int PROPERTY_SCALE_TYPE
      Indicates that the panel has changed its scaling to either linear or logarithmic.
      static int PROPERTY_SCALE_VISIBLE
      Indicates that the panel's scale has changed visibility.
      static int PROPERTY_X_ORIENTATION
      Indicates that the panel's x-axis orientation has changed.
      static int PROPERTY_Y_ORIENTATION
      Indicates that the panel's y-axis orientation has changed.
      static int PROPERTY_ZERO_ENERGY_COLOR
      Indicates that the panel's behavior for coloring zero-energy crystals has changed.
      private static long serialVersionUID
